organizations: Network Writers New York Post Khloe
title: How the Kardashians ruin lives
text:
How the Kardashians destroy people’s lives for reality TV ratings Maureen Callahan and Network Writers New York Post How the Kardashians destroy people’s lives for reality TV ratings Maureen Callahan and Network Writers New York Post Khloe visits Lamar Odom in hospital 0:28 
Khloe Kardashian has flown to the hospital bedside of her ex-husband Lamar Odom. October 15th 2015 /video/video.news.com.au/Entertainment/ 
OPINION 
AS former NBA star Lamar Odom clings to life in a Las Vegas hospital, his soon-to-be ex-wife Khloe Kardashian and her clan have done what they do best: make the story all about them. 
Before the Kardashians even made it to the hospital, there was no dignity here. Odom was found on Tuesday unconscious and face down in a Nevada brothel , choking on his own mucous, damage to his lungs from crack cocaine and track marks on his arms. He’d spent four days and $US75,000 ($103,000) there, in a grim whorehouse that most closely resembles a Marriott. Visit ... Kylie Jenner, Kourtney Kardashian and Kim Kardashian exit through a back door after visiting Lamar Odom at Sunrise Hospital & Medical Center. Picture: David Becker/Getty Images In happier times ... Rob Kardashian, Lamar Odom, Khloe Kardashian Odom, Kourtney Kardashian and Kim Kardashian on April 4, 2011. Picture: Frederick M. Brown/Getty Images In the past ... Khloe Kardashian, Rob Kardashian and Lamar Odom celebrate at the 2011 BBVA NBA All-Star Celebrity Game at the Los Angeles Convention Center on February 18, 2011. Picture: Noel Vasquez/Getty Images Support network ... Lamar Odom's daughter Destiny, son Lamar Jr., Kim Kardashian, Kris Jenner and Khloe Kardashian attend Game Seven of the NBA playoff finals on June 17, 2010. Picture: Noel Vasquez/Getty Images Whirlwind ... Kim Kardashian and NBA star Kris Humphries wed after a 90-day romance. Pictue: AP Photo/Matt Sayles Fat-shamed ... Rob Kardashian reportedly feels alone. Picture: Splash News Family ... Kylie Jenner with Tyga and Khloe Kardashian. Picture: Instagram Dysfunctional relationship ... Scott Disick and Kourtney Kardashian. Picture: Dimitrios Kambouris/Getty Images for Dom Perignon Scott Disick admits he made a big mistake 0:18 
Scott Disick admits he made a huge mistake in ruining his relationship with Kourtney Kardashian. Courtesy: E News October 13th 2015
